title: Home and Away's Joel McIlroy charged with assaulting a female police officer
text:
Former Home & Away Actor Joel McIlroy is behind bars, accused of punching and shoulder-charging a female police officer in Sydney.

The 46-year-old is due to face Central Local Court on Wednesday after he was involved in the alleged assault of the police officer in Surry Hills on Tuesday.

Another man was under arrest on Rutland Street for minor property-related offences about 11.15am on Tuesday, when McIlroy approached the group.

Former Home & Away Actor Joel McIlroy (left) is behind bars, accused of punching and shoulder-charging a female police officer in Surry Hills yesterday

He was not involved in the incident and was directed to leave by police when he approached.

Instead of leaving McIlroy then allegedly shoulder-charged and punched a female senior constable.

Police attempted to arrest him before a scuffle broke out, causing the 46-year-old and two officers to fall to the ground.

A member of the public then became involved as McIlroy was arrested and taken to Surry Hills Police Station.

The 29-year-old female officer sustained injuries to her face, neck and shoulder as she was allegedly punched repeatedly.

Paramedics treated the officer at the scene before she was taken to St Vincent's hospital and is expected to be released later today.

McIlroy was charged with two counts of assaulting an officer while on duty, resisting an officer on duty and wilfully obstructing an officer while on duty.

He was refused bail and is set to appear at Central Local Court on Wednesday.

authors: Lauren Ferri For Daily Mail Australia
